             self.assertFalse(isinstance(idx, int))

body:
I've pushed a set of baseline numba integration cases which are "working on my machine" 😉.

This will likely require adding numba to your CI configuration, presumably at pietern/pytorch-dockerfiles? Would you like to coordinate a change to your CI before this pull?
